tooltip.en: The names and references to methods used to collect or sample an occurrence Example(s): UV light trap, mist net, Takats et al. 2001. Guidelines for Nocturnal Owl Monitoring in North America. Beaverhill Bird Observatory and Bird Studies Canada, Edmonton, Alberta. 32 pp., http://www.bsc-eoc.org/download/Owl.pdf. See Darwin Core's samplingProtocol.

meta.name: Sampling Protocol
